questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant shape of this footwear?
Observing the outsole's texture, what dominant pattern is discernible?
What color is the prominent, visible portion of the shoe's sole?

What is the most apparent color of the upper portion visible on the shoe?
Is the visible branding or logo clearly identifiable on the shoe?
Considering its construction, would you describe the visible stitching?
What is the apparent texture of the visible portion of the shoe's upper?

What is the most prominent feature visible at the back of the sole?
Does the sole demonstrate visible wear from use or is it new?
Examining the overall design, how would you describe the style of this shoe?
Considering the material, does the upper look like leather, suede or similar?
Is there evidence of any visible damage or significant imperfections?
What is the discernible material used predominantly for the shoe's insole?
